personal.name: Federico Sabbadini
personal.title: Master's Student in Computer Engineering
personal.tagline: Curious and determined person with a strong interest in technology and problem-solving. I approach challenges with commitment and consistency, aiming to continuously improve both my technical and analytical skills.
bio: Born in 2002 and based in the province of Brescia, Italy. I completed my scientific high school education at Istituto Salesiano Don Bosco in Chiari (BS) and earned a Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering from the University of Brescia.

I am currently pursuing a Master's degree in Computer Engineering, expected to be completed in Autumn 2026. I'm a curious and determined person with a strong interest in technology and problem-solving. I approach challenges with commitment and consistency, aiming to continuously improve both my technical and analytical skills.
